data.name: Planetary Deliver
data.detailed_description:
Planetary Deliver is a free roam educational package delivery game. You will learn cities, countries, vegetation, geography, etc...

Gameplay
So, basically, You have airplane and you work as a carrier/package delivery person! You get missions to deliver packages to certain locations against time/other player. For example to Helsinki, Finland. Do you know where is that place? If you don't, you will learn! You will be rewarded for successful deliveries. With money you can upgrade your airplane and buy new ones. Psst, be careful tornados are bad for airplanes.

  • Multiplayer
  • Nice graphics
  • Relaxing Gameplay
  • Super chill
  • Education
data.about_the_game:
Planetary Deliver is a free roam educational package delivery game. You will learn cities, countries, vegetation, geography, etc...

Gameplay
So, basically, You have airplane and you work as a carrier/package delivery person! You get missions to deliver packages to certain locations against time/other player. For example to Helsinki, Finland. Do you know where is that place? If you don't, you will learn! You will be rewarded for successful deliveries. With money you can upgrade your airplane and buy new ones. Psst, be careful tornados are bad for airplanes.

  • Multiplayer
  • Nice graphics
  • Relaxing Gameplay
  • Super chill
  • Education
data.short_description: If you want to learn about cities, countries and geography overall but in a fun and soothing way you should jump aboard the Planetary Deliver! Your job is to transport different packages around the world and build your own plane! You can play alone or with your friends.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 (1GB) or AMD Radeon HD 7770 (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 780 Ti/970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
